page.title: 01General Description of Block
page.content: Our 4km x 3km block, number 03960312 is situated in Staffordshire on the edge of Cannock Chase. It contains parts of Chadsmoor, Pye Green, Hednes- ford and Huntington which are all admin -istered by Cannock Urban District Coun -cil. The whole area is dominated by the Post Office telecommunications tow- er situated at Pye Green. Huntington is the site of one of the two remaining deep coal mines which are all that is left of the Cannock Chase Coalfield. There is little light industry in the block, and the land is divided almost equally between housing, farming and the coniferous woods and open spaces of Cannock Chase. Stafford lies to the North beyond Cannock Chase with its coniferous plantations and open heath land, while to the South lies the Wolverhampton conurbation.
